name: Divine Retribution
title: Rosaria: Divine Retribution
in_play_description: When your Rosaria, who has this card equipped, is on the field: Uses Ravaging Confession, or after you generate Strike Where It Hurts, create 1 Changing Shifts card in your Hand. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Rosaria to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Rosaria, equip this card. After Rosaria equips this card, immediately use Ravaging Confession once. When your Rosaria, who has this card equipped, is on the field: Uses Ravaging Confession, or after you generate Strike Where It Hurts, create 1 Changing Shifts card in your Hand. (Once per Round) (You must have Rosaria in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
